meanings.definition: To perform a curtsy as a gesture of respect or politeness.
meanings.sent1: She curtsied gracefully in front of the queen.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, she curtsied to thank the kind lady.
meanings.sent3: The little girl curtsied to her teddy bear, pretending it was a royal guest.
meanings.sent4: The trees curtsied in the wind, as if paying homage to nature.
meanings.sent5: Her curtsy was so elegant, it left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.sent1: After the performance, she curtsied to the audience.
meanings.sent2: She curtsied at the end of the dance routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat curtsied after catching the mouse, as if showing off its victory.
meanings.sent4: The old clock curtsied one last time before finally stopping.
meanings.sent5: The flowers curtsied in the garden, their petals bending gracefully.
